summary.span: 表示一个 列，该列在其单元格中承载 控件。

span.span: Represents a column that hosts controls in its cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，显示的布尔数据作为列。Use to display columns of Boolean data as a . 下图显示的示例。The following illustration shows an example of . ![一个 DataGridCheckBox 列](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "DataGridCheckBox 列")![A DataGridCheckBox column](~/add/media/wpf-datagrid-checkbox.png "A DataGridCheckBox column") 若要填充列，将列绑定到数据使用属性。To populate the column, bind the column to the data by using the property. 属性应用于列中创建的元素。The property is applied to the element created in the column. 单元格处于每个单元中的元素是行的数据项目。The for the element in each cell is the data item for the row the cell is in. 因此，若要将绑定设置你只需设置。Therefore, to set up the binding you only have to set the . 或者，可以指定如果你的数据源和目标是不同的类型。Optionally, you can specify a if your data source and target are different types. 有关数据绑定的详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md)。For more information about data binding, see [Data Binding (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-wpf.md). 你可以自定义通过设置属性，如， ， ，和。You can customize the by setting properties, such as , , , and . 如果你想要显示其他类型的数据，提供下列类型：If you want to display other types of data, provides the following column types: |列名称Column Type|数据显示Data Display| |-----------------|------------------| ||用于显示 URI 数据。Use to display URI data.| ||用于显示枚举数据。Use to display enumeration data.| ||用于显示文本。Use to display text.| 如果你想要使用中的其他控件你，你可以通过创建自己的列类型。If you want to use other controls in your , you can create your own column types by using . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将添加。The following example shows how to add a . 此示例使用数据库作为源，并显示布尔型数据的列。This example uses a database as the source and displays a column of Boolean data. [!code-xaml[DataGrid_CheckBoxColumn#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/datagrid_checkboxcolumn/CS/window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所承载的 控件是支持三种状态还是两种状态。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the hosted controls enable three states or two.

value.span: 如果承载的控件支持三种状态，则为 ；如果它们支持两种状态，则为 。

span.span: if the hosted controls support three states; if they support two states.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，可以使用一个可以为 null 的布尔值，因为数据类型，并具有与相同的功能属性。The property lets you use a nullable Boolean as the data type and has the same functionality as the property on . 三个状态为属性控件`true`， `false`，和`null`。The three states for the property of the control are `true`, `false`, and `null`.

param.name: editingElement
param.span: 列为处于编辑模式的单元格显示的元素。

span.span: The element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

param.name: editingEventArgs
param.span: 有关导致单元格进入编辑模式的用户笔势的信息。

span.span: Information about the user gesture that is causing a cell to enter editing mode.

summary.span: 当列中的单元格进入编辑模式时调用。

span.span: Called when a cell in the column enters editing mode.
The unedited value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制调用方法时列中的单元派生自进入编辑模式。The control calls the method when a cell in a column derived from enters editing mode. 类重写此方法以立即响应用户手势通过更新中所承载的值控件。The class overrides this method to respond immediately to the user gesture by updating the value in the hosted control. 此即时响应是必需的因为单元格进入编辑模式与更改其托管的状态的相同用户笔势。This immediate response is necessary because a cell enters edit mode with the same user gesture that changes the state of its hosted .

span.span: The cell to update.

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 已更改的列属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the column property that has changed.

summary.span: 刷新列中单元格的内容，以响应列属性值更改。

span.span: Refreshes the contents of a cell in the column in response to a column property value change.
